original_title: No One Here Gets Out Alive: A Tribute To Jim Morrison
overview: No One Here Gets Out Alive, The Doors' tribute to Jim Morrison is a full exploration of the controversial and quixotic singer, delving into his fascination with cinema and psychology, mysticism and sexuality, poetry and power. In addition to clips of the band in action, it features interviews with the surviving members of The Doors and many others who were instrumental in creating and maintaining the legend.
title: No One Here Gets Out Alive: A Tribute To Jim Morrison
